name: castlevania 06
description:
My first 3D game, I was 14. Was made in GM6 in 2006 so you might have to run the exe in compatibility mode. Probably is a tutorial edit of some kind, can't remember.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: move
  • Z, E, Strafe left / right
  • Spacebar: shoot
  • F4: fullscreen
  • Escape: close game

Cheats (recommended):

  • F5: save
  • F6: load
  • Enter: go to next room
